title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.15 - Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.15 - Facilities

State Regulations

Each course shall be conducted in such premises and in such
facilities as shall be necessary to properly present the course. The sponsor
must attest that there is a certificate of occupancy, as well as fire and
health permits, for the specific facility to be used and, in addition, must
attest that the facility is in full compliance with the Federal Americans with

Disabilities Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1107.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
